title: Four Hours Left
author: VD
content_html:
To back the SOULSIGMA campaign, which is very close to its stretch goal. The 10-song album is complete, mastered, and will be released on Thursday. For an idea of what the music sounds like, here is what may or may not be one of the bonus tracks.

DISCUSS ON SG
